data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Toronto.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BMO Field.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Toronto.
Free kick Vancouver.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Toronto.
In the minute 22, Toronto takes a corner from the right.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Pablo Piatti.
Great play from Jonathan Osorio to set up the goal.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Richie Laryea.
In the minute 31, Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Richie Laryea for Toronto is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Pablo Piatti (Toronto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jozy Altidore (Toronto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 39, Toronto takes a corner from the right.
Toronto takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Toronto at BMO Field.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in Vancouver.
In the minute 45, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 48, Toronto have a goal kick.
Toronto are coming forward and Alejandro Pozuelo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Jozy Altidore's header is off-target for Toronto.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 55, Goal! Toronto extend their lead to 2-0 through Pablo Piatti.
That's a fine assist from Jonathan Osorio.
Toronto make their first substitution with Patrick Mullins replacing Jozy Altidore.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BMO Field.
In the minute 60, Theo Bair is replacing Cristian Gutierrez for the away team.
In the minute 60, David Milinkovic is on a sub for Cristian Dajome for Vancouver.
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Jonathan Osorio (Toronto) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 63, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Pablo Piatti (Toronto) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 66, In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alejandro Pozuelo of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Yordy Reyna with Ryan Raposo.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
Ali Adnan of Vancouver gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 72, Toronto make their second substitution with Justin Morrow replacing Richie Laryea.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
The home team replace Marky Delgado with Nick DeLeon.
In the minute 74, Vancouver are caught offside.
Russell Teibert is booked for the away team.
Toronto takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 78, Free kick Toronto.
In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Auro (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, Patrick Metcalfe is replacing Russell Teibert for the away team.
Tosaint Ricketts is on a sub for Lucas Cavallini for Vancouver.
Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
In the minute 83, Toronto take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Nick DeLeon.
Alejandro Pozuelo with an assist there.
Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
Toronto make their fifth substitution with Liam Fraser replacing Alejandro Pozuelo.
In the minute 85, Tsubasa Endoh is replacing Pablo Piatti for the home team.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Toronto takes a corner from the right.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
